docs.title: Welcome to the Pierre-Etienne's data science portfolio
Who am I ?
docs.text: I'm a pharmacist by training, but above all I'm passionate about data science in all its facets: from EDA with table description packages to visualization using the latest web technologies, via modeling including AI.

docs.title: My actuals projects
docs.text:
Pour cataloguer l'ensemble de l'open data disponible en France, j'entretiens un catalogue de l'open data en france (le site est en français).

Link : https://petoulemonde.github.io/catalogue-open-data-sante
